list_definition.definition: to knit using a single small needle with a hooked end (a crochet hook)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She was crocheting a scarf for her husband.

list_ex_of_english: There are too many loopholes with national regulations crocheted in elsewhere, making individual interpretations possible and the whole thing impenetrable.

Make a slip-knot in yarn and put it on the crochet hook or right-hand needle.
